Class EmployeeController

java.lang.Object
com.pekings.pos.controller.EmployeeController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/employee") public class EmployeeController extends Object
REST Controller for managing Employee-related operations. Provides endpoints for CRUD operations on employees and retrieving employee-specific data.

  • Method Details

    • getAllEmployees

      @GetMapping("/all") public List<Employee> getAllEmployees()
      Retrieves all employees.
      Returns:
      A list of all employees in the system.

    • getAllEmployees

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public Employee getAllEmployees(@PathVariable("id") int id)
      Retrieves an employee by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the desired employee.
      Returns:
      The employee matching the provided ID, or null if not found.

    • getEmployeeByEmail

      @GetMapping public Employee getEmployeeByEmail(@RequestParam("email") String email)
      Retrieves an employee by their email address.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the desired employee.
      Returns:
      The first employee with a matching email address, or null if not found.

    • getEmployeeOrders

      @GetMapping("/{id}/orders") public List<Order> getEmployeeOrders(@PathVariable("id") int id)
      Retrieves all orders placed by a specific employee.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the employee whose orders are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of orders associated with the given employee ID.

    • updateEmployee

      @PatchMapping("/update") public Employee updateEmployee(@RequestBody Employee employee)
      Updates an existing employee's details.
      Parameters:
      employee - The updated employee object, which must include a valid ID.
      Returns:
      The updated employee object if successful, or null if the ID is not provided.

    • addEmployee

      @PostMapping("/add") public Employee addEmployee(@RequestBody Employee employee)
      Adds a new employee to the system.
      Parameters:
      employee - The employee object to be added.
      Returns:
      The added employee object after it is saved to the database.

    • deleteEmployee

      @DeleteMapping("/delete") public void deleteEmployee(@RequestBody int id)
      Deletes an employee from the system.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the employee to be deleted.
